* Represents the Deadline task. Deadline tasks are tasks that need to be done by a specific date/time.
* Returns the Deadline class as a string format.
* Represents the Event task. Event tasks are tasks that start and end at a specific time.
* Returns the Event class as a string format.
* Represents a Task. This class cannot be instantiated and serves as a Parent class for specific Task classes
* Represents the TaskList, which contains all current tasks.
public static ArrayList<Task> tasks = new ArrayList<>();
* Represents the Todo task. Todo tasks are tasks without any date/time attached to it.
